channel.title: Job Interviews on Clay's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Job Interviews on Clay's Blog

item.title: Pillars Of A Good Hire
item.description: Are you looking to break into the tech industry? Get out of that mindless software contracting job? This guide is for you! There are three pillars that I based my preparation for job interviews on recently that lead to multiple job offers–including one that doubled my base salary. I believe that working through these three pillars will make you a strong enough candidate to ‘upgrade’ your career one level. What I mean by this is that you can jump one level–such as being outside of the industry to getting your first development job.
